tilapia.name: Tilapia, cooked
tilapia.insight: Lean white fish with excellent protein and selenium. Lower in omega-3s than fatty fish like salmon, but still a healthy choice with vitamin D and B12.

balanced.insight: Excellent lean protein source with strong selenium and B12. Lower omega-3s than fatty fish but very low in calories and saturated fat.

heart_health.insight: Lean fish with low saturated fat and good potassium. Omega-3 content is modest compared to fatty fish like salmon or mackerel.

muscle_building.insight: Outstanding protein-to-calorie ratio (22g protein / 109 cal). Complete amino acid profile with good selenium for muscle recovery.

energy.insight: Good B-vitamins (niacin, B12) for energy metabolism, but zero carbs means no quick fuel. Best paired with carb sources.

weight_management.insight: Exceptional for weight loss: 22g protein in just 109 calories. High satiety, virtually no carbs or fat.

brain_focus.insight: Good B12 and choline for cognitive function. Lower omega-3 DHA than fatty fish, but still provides some brain-healthy fats.

bone_strength.insight: Strong vitamin D (130 IU) and phosphorus, but low calcium. Pair with dairy or leafy greens for complete bone support.

gut_health.insight: Zero fiber and no prebiotics. Protein is digestible but won't directly support gut microbiome. Pair with vegetables.

immunity.insight: Exceptional selenium (41.8µg = 76% DV) and good vitamin D for immune function. Protein supports antibody production.

skin_beauty.insight: High protein for collagen, excellent selenium for antioxidant protection. Low omega-3s limit skin hydration benefits.

tilapia_fillet.name: Tilapia fillet, cooked
tilapia_fillet.insight: Lean white fish with excellent protein and selenium. Lower in omega-3s than fatty fish like salmon, but still a healthy choice with vitamin D and B12.

balanced.insight: Excellent lean protein source with strong selenium and B12. Lower omega-3s than fatty fish but very low in calories and saturated fat.

muscle_building.insight: Outstanding protein-to-calorie ratio (22g protein / 109 cal). Complete amino acid profile with good selenium for muscle recovery.

weight_management.insight: Exceptional for weight loss: 22g protein in just 109 calories. High satiety, virtually no carbs or fat.

bone_strength.insight: Strong vitamin D (130 IU) and phosphorus, but low calcium. Pair with dairy or leafy greens for complete bone support.

gut_health.insight: Zero fiber and no prebiotics. Protein is digestible but won't directly support gut microbiome. Pair with vegetables.

immunity.insight: Exceptional selenium (41.8µg = 76% DV) and good vitamin D for immune function. Protein supports antibody production.

skin_beauty.insight: High protein for collagen, excellent selenium for antioxidant protection. Low omega-3s limit skin hydration benefits.

cod.name: Cod, Atlantic, cooked
cod.insight: Ultra-lean white fish with exceptional protein (41g per fillet). Excellent selenium and B12, though lower omega-3s than fatty fish. A muscle-building powerhouse.

balanced.insight: Outstanding protein density (41g) with minimal fat and calories. Exceptional selenium, B12, and phosphorus. Lower omega-3s than fatty fish.

heart_health.insight: Very low saturated fat and good potassium (439mg). Omega-3s present but lower than fatty fish. Excellent for lean protein.

muscle_building.insight: One of the best foods for muscle building: 41g complete protein in just 189 calories. Exceptional selenium for recovery.

energy.insight: Strong B-vitamin profile (niacin, B6, B12) for energy metabolism. Selenium supports thyroid function. No carbs for quick energy.

weight_management.insight: Perfect for weight loss: 41g protein in just 189 calories. Extremely high satiety with virtually no fat or carbs.

brain_focus.insight: Excellent choline (141mg) and B12 for cognitive function. Good omega-3 DHA, though less than salmon. High selenium protects brain cells.

bone_strength.insight: Excellent phosphorus (410mg) and good vitamin D for bone health. Low calcium means pairing with dairy or greens is ideal.

gut_health.insight: Zero fiber and no prebiotics. Lean protein is digestible but doesn't feed gut bacteria. Pair with fiber-rich vegetables.

immunity.insight: Exceptional selenium (73.8µg = 134% DV) and good vitamin D, B12, and zinc for immune function. High protein supports antibody production.

skin_beauty.insight: High protein (41g) for collagen synthesis, exceptional selenium for antioxidant protection. Some omega-3s for skin hydration.

cod_fish.name: Cod fish, Atlantic, cooked
cod_fish.insight: Ultra-lean white fish with exceptional protein (41g per fillet). Excellent selenium and B12, though lower omega-3s than fatty fish. A muscle-building powerhouse.

balanced.insight: Outstanding protein density (41g) with minimal fat and calories. Exceptional selenium, B12, and phosphorus. Lower omega-3s than fatty fish.

crab.name: Crab, Alaska king, cooked
crab.insight: Nutrient-dense shellfish with exceptional B12, zinc, and copper. Very high in sodium (1072mg) - choose fresh over canned for lower sodium. Outstanding protein source.

balanced.insight: Exceptional micronutrient density (B12, zinc, copper) with high protein and low calories. Very high sodium is the main drawback.

heart_health.insight: Very low saturated fat and good omega-3s, but extremely high sodium (1072mg) raises blood pressure concerns. Choose fresh, not canned.

muscle_building.insight: Excellent protein (22g) with exceptional zinc (8.7mg) for muscle recovery and testosterone. Complete amino acid profile.
cons: Very high sodium may cause water retention

energy.insight: Exceptional B12 (542% DV!) for energy metabolism. Good copper and magnesium. Zero carbs means no quick energy.

weight_management.insight: Outstanding for weight loss: 22g protein in just 110 calories. Very high satiety and minimal fat. Watch sodium for water retention.
cons: High sodium may cause temporary water weight

brain_focus.insight: Exceptional B12 (13µg) and choline (106mg) for cognitive function. Good omega-3 DHA for brain health. High copper supports neurotransmitters.

bone_strength.insight: Good calcium, phosphorus, and magnesium for bone health. No vitamin D means pairing with fortified foods is beneficial.

gut_health.insight: Zero fiber and no prebiotics. High sodium may disrupt gut bacteria balance. Protein is digestible but doesn't feed microbiome.

immunity.insight: Exceptional zinc (8.7mg = 79% DV), B12, and selenium for immune function. Copper supports white blood cell production. Outstanding immune food.

skin_beauty.insight: Exceptional zinc (8.7mg) for skin repair and acne prevention. High protein for collagen. Good omega-3s and copper for elasticity.
